Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 45th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2002...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (A) on 1/31/2003 (Going to CHA: RF E. Dukes. Going to NYN: C M. Ojeda)...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Oakland on 5/19/2005 (Going to CHA: RF V. Guerrero. Going to OAK: P J. Peavy, LF E. Dukes)...
Had first career hit on 4/5/2006, off Rick Greene (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/2006, off Jeff C. D'Amico (TEX)...
Injured on 6/27/2007 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Kansas City on 6/20/2008...
Hit for the cycle against Atlanta on 7/23/2010...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/2010, hitting .417 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Traded from Oakland to San Diego on 7/31/2010 (Going to SDN: LF E. Dukes, 2B P. Polanco, CF M. Taylor. Going to OAK: 2B C. Utley, CF J. Gomes)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/2010, hitting .579 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2010, hitting .435 with 10 HR, 27 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Arizona on 6/10/2011...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 8/9/2011...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/2012, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2012 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/2012, hitting .400 with 5 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2012, hitting .356 with 10 HR, 35 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 8/24/2013...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2013, hitting .384 with 11 HR, 30 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 4/11/2014...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 9/7/2014...
Won World Championship with San Diego in 2014...
Injured on 7/3/2016 with a Broken Foot, out for 7-8 weeks...
Traded from San Diego to New York (N) on 7/31/2016 (Going to SDN: CF C. Yelich, P T. Rousey. Going to NYN: C V. Martinez, LF E. Dukes, 2B A. Diaz, P E. Lipton, CF C. Coghlan)...
Injured on 9/14/2016 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Washington on 4/22/2017...
Injured on 6/11/2017 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 8/14/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 2/11/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $6,300,000 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/5/2020, off Victor Black (MIN)...
Drove in 7 runs against Texas on 9/18/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/11/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
